**Granted Power:** You gain [[Martial Weapon Proficiency (Feat)|Martial Weapon Proficiency]] or [[Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Feat)|Exotic Weapon Proficiency]] (as appropriate) and [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] with your choice of hammer as bonus feats. You need not meet the prerequisites for these feats.

**METAL DOMAIN SPELLS**

**1** **[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|Magic Weapon]]****:** Weapon gains +1 bonus.

   **[[Iron Scarf (Spell)|Iron Scarf]]****:** Silk scarf becomes ranged weapon dealing 1d8+1/level damage.

**2** **[[Heat Metal (Spell)|Heat Metal]]****:** Make metal so hot it damages those who touch it.

**3** **[[Keen Edge (Spell)|Keen Edge]]****:** Doubles normal weaponâ€™s threat range.

  **[[Magnetism, Greater (Spell)|Magnetism, Greater]]****:** Draw iron or steel objects to yourself.

**4** **[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|Rusting Grasp]]****:** Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

**5** **[[Wall of Iron (Spell)|Wall of Iron]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates an iron wall with 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

**6** **[[Blade Barrier (Spell)|Blade Barrier]]****:** Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.

**7** **[[Transmute Metal to Wood (Spell)|Transmute Metal to Wood]]****:** Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

   **[[Move Earth (Spell)|Move Earth]]****:** Digs trenches and builds hills.

**8** **[[Iron Body (Spell)|Iron Body]]****:** Your body becomes living iron.

**9** **[[Repel Metal or Stone (Spell)|Repel Metal or Stone]]****:** Pushes away metal and stone.
